page.title: 12Biography.
page.content: Mrs Ruane is a lively,energetic person who helps at the Youth Club, Girlguides and St.Johns.She volunteered to help with the Domesday Project because she enjoys local history.Her husband is a semi invalid who helps her in the house.She began working at the Youth Club when they needed a First Aider.She works two mornings a week at Westgate First School.She works 3 evenings a week and Saturday mornings,covering ten hours,four of them paid."Stainforth has an undeserved reputation",she says "It is a very nice place to live."In spite of being terrified of water, recently she has learned to swim.
